Usage

Instalation

To use InmetPy, install it with pip:

pip install inmetpy

Package Overview

The inmetpy package is a library which provides a python interface to request data from the Official INMET API. This API provides access to information and data from all INMET meteorological stations installed in Brazil. The INMET owns more than 700 stations, which the first one dates from 1925!

You can know more about INMET in the official site (https://portal.inmet.gov.br/) and more about the meteorological stations in this nice interface, also official from INMET, https://mapas.inmet.gov.br/.

The link to the API manual is https://portal.inmet.gov.br/manual/manual-de-uso-da-api-esta%C3%A7%C3%B5es

List stations

1from inmetpy.inmet_stations import InmetStation
2
3inmet = InmetStation()
4
5print(inmet.stations.head(10).to_markdown())

The ´inmet´ object contains a list of all stations available at the INMET API, since the first convetional stations to the modern ones.

It has two types of stations, “Automatic” stations (“A”) and “Traditional” stations (“M”, from “Manual”).

To get filter out just the automatic stations:

1from inmetpy.inmet_stations import InmetStation
2
3inmet = InmetStation()
4
5automatic_stations = inmet.get_auto_stations()
6
7print(automatic_stations.head(10).to_markdown())
8print(len(automatic_stations))

Search Stations

It is possible to search stations following either two criterias, the state (or states) that wanted to search or search the closest n stations near by a given location.

Search stations by state

 1from inmetpy.inmet_stations import InmetStation
 2
 3inmet = InmetStation()
 4
 5# Looking for stations in the Amazonas and Rio de Janeiro states.
 6states = ["AM","RJ"]
 7
 8stations = inmet.search_station_by_state(states)
 9
10print(stations.head(5).to_markdown())

|    | CD_OSCAR       | STATION_NAME    | FL_CAPITAL   | END_DATE_OPERATION   | CD_SITUATION   | TP_STATION   |   LATITUDE | CD_WSI                  |   CD_DISTRICT |   HEIGHT | STATE   | INSTITUTE   | CD_STATION   |   LONGITUDE | START_DATE_OPERATION          |
|---:|:---------------|:----------------|:-------------|:---------------------|:---------------|:-------------|-----------:|:------------------------|--------------:|---------:|:--------|:------------|:-------------|------------:|:------------------------------|
| 23 |                | ANGRA DOS REIS  | N            |                      | Operative      | Automatic    | -22.9756   | 0-76-0-3300100000000555 |            06 |     6    | RJ      | INMET       | A628         |    -44.3033 | 2017-08-24T21:00:00.000-03:00 |
| 26 | 0-2000-0-81893 | APUI            |              |                      | Operative      | Automatic    |  -7.20556  | 0-76-0-1300144000000406 |            01 |   156.97 | AM      | INMET       | A113         |    -59.8886 | 2008-07-18T21:00:00.000-03:00 |
| 41 | 0-2000-0-86892 | ARRAIAL DO CABO | N            |                      | Operative      | Automatic    | -22.9753   | 0-76-0-3300258000000108 |            06 |     5    | RJ      | INMET       | A606         |    -42.0214 | 2006-09-21T21:00:00.000-03:00 |
| 42 | 0-2000-0-81732 | AUTAZES         |              |                      | Operative      | Automatic    |  -3.58333  | 0-76-0-1300300000000339 |            01 |    19.9  | AM      | INMET       | A120         |    -59.1294 | 2008-04-16T21:00:00.000-03:00 |
| 51 | 0-2000-0-81648 | BARCELOS        | N            |                      | Operative      | Automatic    |  -0.987222 | 0-76-0-1300409000000344 |            01 |    29.88 | AM      | INMET       | A128         |    -62.9242 | 2008-04-18T21:00:00.000-03:00 |

Search stations by coordinates

 1from inmetpy.inmet_stations import InmetStation
 2
 3inmet = InmetStation()
 4
 5# Looking for stations in the Amazonas and Rio de Janeiro states.
 6states = ["AM","RJ"]
 7
 8stations = inmet.search_station_by_coords(lat=-22.4212, lon=-42.4518, n_stations = 2)
 9
10print(stations.head(5).to_markdown())

|     | CD_OSCAR       | STATION_NAME            | FL_CAPITAL   | END_DATE_OPERATION   | CD_SITUATION   | TP_STATION   |   LATITUDE | CD_WSI                  |   CD_DISTRICT |   HEIGHT | STATE   | INSTITUTE   | CD_STATION   |   LONGITUDE | START_DATE_OPERATION          |   DISTANCE |
|----:|:---------------|:------------------------|:-------------|:---------------------|:---------------|:-------------|-----------:|:------------------------|--------------:|---------:|:--------|:------------|:-------------|------------:|:------------------------------|-----------:|
| 341 | 0-2000-0-86889 | NOVA FRIBURGO - SALINAS |              |                      | Operative      | Automatic    |   -22.3347 | 0-76-0-3303401000000466 |            06 |     1070 | RJ      | INMET       | A624         |    -42.6769 | 2010-09-17T21:00:00.000-03:00 |    25.0673 |
| 515 | 0-2000-0-86893 | SILVA JARDIM            | N            |                      | Operative      | Automatic    |   -22.6458 | 0-76-0-3305604000000505 |            06 |       19 | RJ      | INMET       | A659         |    -42.4156 | 2015-08-27T21:00:00.000-03:00 |    25.2539 |
